alert.note: Alert for Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN POTTER AND TIOGA COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from west of Wellsboro to southeast of Wellsville to west of Mansfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Westfield around 515 PM EDT. Galeton and Gaines around 530 PM EDT. Elkland around 540 PM EDT. Wellsboro, Keeneyville and Leonard Harrison State Park around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Knoxville, Osceola, Tioga, Tioga Junction and Mansfield University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
